name: Virus Jump
description:
The objective of the game is to jump from platform to platform as high as possible without falling in the void.

To move left, you can use the left arrow key or key A, and to move right, you can use the right key or key D. 

The mouse is used to aim the weapon to the target and with left click you shoot the bullet, with which you can eliminate enemies.

As you progress, you will come across power-ups that can help you jump higher. 

The platforms and power-ups are accompanied by various types of monsters.  Avoid or shoot them to maintain your progress.

Keep jumping and see how high you can reach!

Game made by zigac24
